mapper.sql: INFOTP_ID, EXP_DTM, STR_DTM, INFOTP_LNM, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, WRIT_DTM, WRIT_USER_ID, STND_ASRT
mapper.select: SELECT INFOTP_ID ,DATA_TYPE ,DATA_LEN ,DATA_SCAL , NVL( ( SELECT B.DATA_TYPE_NM FROM WAA_DATA_TYPE_MAPRU A INNER JOIN WAA_DBMS_DATA_TYPE B ON A.DBMS_DATA_TYPE_ID = B.DBMS_DATA_TYPE_ID AND A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.DBMS_TYP_CD='ORA' WHERE A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.LGC_DATA_TYPE=D.DATA_TYPE AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND ROWNUM = 1 ),D.DATA_TYPE ) AS oraDataType , NVL( ( SELECT B.DATA_TYPE_NM FROM WAA_DATA_TYPE_MAPRU A INNER JOIN WAA_DBMS_DATA_TYPE B ON A.DBMS_DATA_TYPE_ID = B.DBMS_DATA_TYPE_ID AND A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.DBMS_TYP_CD='MSQ' WHERE A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.LGC_DATA_TYPE=D.DATA_TYPE AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND ROWNUM = 1 ),D.DATA_TYPE ) AS msDataType , NVL( ( SELECT B.DATA_TYPE_NM FROM WAA_DATA_TYPE_MAPRU A INNER JOIN WAA_DBMS_DATA_TYPE B ON A.DBMS_DATA_TYPE_ID = B.DBMS_DATA_TYPE_ID AND A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.DBMS_TYP_CD='MYS' WHERE A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.LGC_DATA_TYPE=D.DATA_TYPE AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND ROWNUM = 1 ),D.DATA_TYPE ) AS myDataType FROM WAA_INFO_TYPE D WHERE EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD')
--기존 인포타입이 있는지 확인한다. SELECT INFOTP_ID ,DATA_TYPE ,DATA_LEN ,DATA_SCAL FROM WAA_INFO_TYPE WHERE EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND INFOTP_LNM = #{infotpLnm} AND STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt}

select
from WAA_INFO_TYPE where INFOTP_ID = #{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE ('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert:
select OBJ_ID.next_value from db_root
insert into WAA_INFO_TYPE (INFOTP_ID, EXP_DTM, STR_DTM, INFOTP_LNM, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, WRIT_DTM, WRIT_USER_ID) values (#{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{strDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{infotpLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{writDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT INTO WAA_INFO_TYPE
INFOTP_ID, EXP_DTM, STR_DTM, INFOTP_LNM, DATA_TYPE,
DATA_LEN,
DATA_SCAL,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
WRIT_DTM,
WRIT_USER_ID,
STND_ASRT,
#{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_DATE ('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD'), SYSDATETIME, #{infotpLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SYSDATETIME,
#{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stndAsrt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update WAA_INFO_TYPE
EXP_DTM = #{expDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
STR_DTM = #{strDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
INFOTP_LNM = #{infotpLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_LEN = #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DATA_SCAL = #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=DATE},
STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where INFOTP_ID = #{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAA_INFO_TYPE set EXP_DTM = #{expDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, STR_DTM = #{strDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, INFOTP_LNM = #{infotpLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_LEN = #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DATA_SCAL = #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STND_ASRT = #{stndAsrt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where INFOTP_ID = #{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UPDATE WAA_INFO_TYPE SET EXP_DTM = SYSDATETIME WHERE INFOTP_ID = #{infotpId} AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
